events.message: I just received my order and noticed that the laptop screen is cracked and has several scratches, which is really disappointing. Please help.
The reported issue has been categorized as a Product Defect due to the mention of a cracked and scratched screen.
Your case has been assigned to one of our technical support agents who will assist you with the defective laptop screen.

Thank you for the photos. We will arrange a replacement laptop to be shipped to you immediately and provide a prepaid label for the return of the damaged unit.
That solution works for me. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the replacement unit soon.

Just checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement laptop and that everything is functioning as expected.
